data.message: Hope your next album is more about two Aussie films, Mental & little miss sunshine graduating up to Priscilla-Queen of the desert and a red dog ending! 😁 hope no one gives a shit now and just sends you money... Ha ha not much to write an album about (I call it welfare cheque ) oxymoron in debt lol

replies.message: You just made me grateful for not hanging myself today but you don't wanna hear that shit when the main Stan, has got bridges to build, himself! Love to Slım Shady (and Entourage, but if you got more than one group; that would be entree?) Your songs will keep on... no matter, album or not! ☺ hope you have an equally surprising Day
No Thank you; I love you just the way you are, from this far and need for no more 😊
Thank you but I am ok, for all those who know a Vincent can only be made after pain! That's why it's called; A Pain-ting! Thank you all the same Marshall Mather and Takneca Ngeh #RegardsAlways
